text: Hlučín (; ) is a town in Opava District in the Moravian-Silesian Region of the Czech Republic. About 14,000 people live there. It was the center of the Hlučín Region. == Twin towns == Hlučín is twinned with: * Namysłów, Poland * Nebelschütz, Germany * Ružomberok, Slovakia == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Towns in the Czech Republic Category:Moravian- Silesian Region
title: Hlučín
